title: The Adventure Zone: Live - Halloween Special!
description: BOO! That's us jumping out and surprising you with an episode that is A) One day early and B) An exquisitely spooky live adventure! It's our Halloween Special, and boy howdy, is it a wild one. Thanks to the Paramount Theater in Seattle, and everyone who came out to see us!
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
